sourceDesc.p: Initial version created with Roma, the ODD generator, version 3.6.
This file was initially used for the Swahili-English dictionary. Later on, it got generalised as the basic schema for Freedict dictionaries encoded in TEI P5.

body.head: ODD for FreeDict dictionaries, basic level of conformance.
body.p: This is the ODD driver for generating schemas and documentation for dictionaries in the FreeDict project (see http://freedict.org/). It is meant primarily for dictionaries with very basic structure, but until higher-level ODDs are created, it will serve all TEI P5 dictionaries. For details, see a TEI Conference and Members' Meeting presentation by Piotr Bański and Beata Wójtowicz, which should be available from http://www.lib.umich.edu/spo/teimeeting09/program.html.

list.item: Commited to the Freedict CVS (still in version 0.3).
Added the "figures" module, for tables in the front matter.
Removed dictScrap and entryFree and the mysterious header elements that cause Sanity Checker warnings.
Removed numbered divs (with a view towards tailoring this ODD for all FreeDict dictionaries).
